Reviews.Author: barry060
Reviews.Content: wife visited berlin time december enjoy citys christmas markets booked hotel pension columbus conveniently situated centre city warm clean fascinating building ceiling heights 42 1900s retaining original features enjoyed warm hospitality owners lots advice visit breakfast excellent spotless hotel real gem recommend wholeheartedly
